name: Worm (The Game)
description:
Dodge spikes and angry monsters!

This project is coming to an end. I've added a pause screen and thats about it for v2.0.0

I am currently working on a similar 2D platformer that will be coming out (hopefully) by 2020

Controls:

Touch/Click in the direction that you want Mr. Worm Face Jr. to go!

This is my first game! Hope you enjoy it!

All art is made by me.
